name: officedev-copilot-for-m365-plugins-samples-msgext-doc-search-js
title: Enable Hybrid Search (Vector + Semantic) for your external data on Microsoft 365 Copilot using Azure AI Search and JavaScript
shortDescription: This sample implements Azure AI Search with a Teams message extension and JavaScript that enables Hybrid Search (Vector + Semantic) and can be used as a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot.
longDescription: This sample implements Azure AI Search with a Teams message extension that enables Hybrid Search (Vector + Semantic) and can be used as a plugin for Microsoft 365 Copilot. It demonstrates how developers can use Microsoft 365 Copilot in **Bring Your Own Data** scenarios instead of building a custom GPT powered bot.
